channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup - April 5, 2019
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Hangouts video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-april-5-2019) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog!
As is the norm at the beginning of the month, a whole bunch of new game series kicked off this week! We've got some new-to-the-library titles like *Things from the Flood*, *Lacuna*, and *HILT // BLADE*, plus of course old favorites like *Monsterhearts*, *Masks*, and *Alas for the Awful Sea*. Thanks to everyone who facilitated and played, and if you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Hangouts](https://discourse.funtimers.club/c/gauntlet-hangouts) category on the Forums and see what's up!
